metadata.name: Suspicious PowerShell Encoded Command Patterns
metadata.comment: Detects PowerShell command line patterns in combincation with encoded commands that often appear in malware infection chains

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\powershell.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\pwsh.exe'))) AND (lower(LOWER(process.file.name)) in ('powershell\.exe', 'pwsh\.dll')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -e ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -en ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -enc ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -enco'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' jab')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' suvyi')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' sqbfafga')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' awv4i')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' iab')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' paa')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' aqblahga'))) AND NOT (contains(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('c:\\packages\\plugins\\microsoft.guestconfiguration.configurationforwindows\\')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\gc_worker.exe'))))

output.summary: Detects PowerShell command line patterns in combincation with encoded commands that often appear in malware infection chains

metadata.objective: False positive: Other tools that work with encoded scripts in the command line instead of script files Reference: https://app.any.run/tasks/b9040c63-c140-479b-ad59-f1bb56ce7a97/
